description: The catalog contains site metadata for the EFI-USGS River Chlorophyll Forecasting Challenge

links.title: EFI-USGS River Chlorophyll Forecasting Challenge Documentation
EFI-USGS River Chlorophyll Forecast Challenge Dashboard

title: Site Metadata

table:columns.name: agency_cd
table:columns.description: organization / agency responsible for site monitoring

table:columns.name: site_no
table:columns.description: National Water Information System stream gage identifier

table:columns.name: station_nm
table:columns.description: National Water Information System station long name

table:columns.name: site_tp_cd
table:columns.description: National Water Information System site type code; https://maps.waterdata.usgs.gov/mapper/help/sitetype.html

table:columns.name: site_url
table:columns.description: National Water Information System URL for monitoring site

table:columns.name: queryTime
table:columns.description: timestamp when site metadata was retrieved

data.title: Site Metadata Access
data.description:
This R code will return results for the site metadata.

### R

```{r}
# Use code below

url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eco4cast/usgsrc4cast-ci/main/USGS_site_metadata.csv"
sites <- readr::read_csv(url, show_col_types = FALSE)
```
